questions.label: Which team did you begin on?
How easy was getting your team's dev environment running?
Any additional feedback or suggestions for improving dev setup?
How would you rank the helpfulness of your mentor?
answers: 0 - I didn't have an assigned mentor
1 - Not helpful, I was on my own
2 - Somewhat helpful, I often had to reach out to others
4 - Extremely helpful, always on the ball and providing guidance

questions.label: Any additional feedback or suggestions for improving mentorship?

answers: I didn't have to create any tickets!

questions.label: How would you rank the response time/helpfulness of IT in getting your privileges finalized?
answers: I didn't have to ask for IT help.
